title: PROJECT: YI jungle first bluebuff doesn't have attack animation
body: I noticed while jungling as yi using the project skin that while i'm doing my first blue, there is no attack animation for blue buff. I still take damage, but the buff is just standing there. This only happened for the first blue buff on the blue side, and as far as I know, only for the project skin.

replies.body:
Hey givemeurmoney -

thanks for the report! Lemme take a look and see what's going on!
